definitions.definition: A level or rank in an organization , profession , or society .
A line of riders seeking maximum drafting in a crosswind , resulting in a diagonal line across the road .
A formation of troops , ships , aircraft , etc., in diagonal parallel rows .

main_definition: A level or rank in an organization , profession , or society .
secondary_definitions: ( cycling ) A line of riders seeking maximum drafting in a crosswind , resulting in a diagonal line across the road .
( military ) A formation of troops , ships , aircraft , etc., in diagonal parallel rows . [from late 18th c.]
